lead_paragraph: Denver Broncos receiver Brandon Marshall could miss up to four months of off-season preparations after slicing his right forearm in a freak accident. After initially playing down the injury that required surgery, Marshall has acknowledged it was the result of horseplay with family members and a misplaced fast-food bag. He said he slipped on the bag Saturday while wrestling with family members at a Florida resort and put his right arm through a home entertainment center.
